Title: Cartoon reference materials for the Criticise Lin Biao Criticise Confucius Campaign 2
Designer: Hangzhou Art Corps (杭州美术工作团)
Notes: The text at the top reads "Grasp the top priority and go deep into criticizing Lin Biao and Confucius -- Severely criticize Lin Biao's reactionary program of attempting to restore capitalism -- 'restraining oneself and restoring rituals'" (抓紧头等大事深入批林批孔 -- 狠批林彪妄图复辟资本主义的反动纲领--“克己复礼”). This is the second of two sheets of caricatures.
Theme: Criticize Lin Biao and Confucius (1974)Cultural Revolution Campaigns (1966-1976)
